description: Temporary Help Services and has issued a Request for Proposal to suppliers
full_summary:
**Tender Announcement**
=====================================================

**Title:** NPP - S4432164 - THS SA - Temporary Help Services against the Supply Arrangement for the National Capital Region (NCR)

**Original Solicitation Number:** S4432164
**Updated Solicitation Number:** n/a (terminated)

**Publication Date:** 2023-07-04
**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-07-12 (Time Zone: UTC-5)

**Contracting Entity:** Department of National Defense
**Conact Information:**

* CFSG(O-G) Temp Help, Temporary Help, e-mail: [CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdatedaiddtemporaire@forces.gc.ca](mailto:CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdatedaiddtemporaire@forces.gc.ca)
* Phone: (613) 971-7955

**Tender Description:**
The Department of National Defense (DND) requires a request for proposal from suppliers holding a valid supply arrangement (SA) number EN578-172870. Suppliers must have qualified under the "Special Advisor" stream and category to participate in this tender.

**Background Information:**
The successful supplier will provide temporary help services against the unit's current supply arrangement. The positions require Secret-level cleared personnel.

**Eligible Suppliers:**
Besides the initial twenty-one (21) eligible suppliers listed in the tender document attached to this entry, only those suppliers holding a valid supply arrangement (SA) number EN578-172870 and qualified under the "Special Advisor" stream and category are invited to submit a proposal.

**Security Requirement:**
Resource(s) Minimum Security Level Required is/are: Secret

**Tender Documents:**
The original tender notice is attached to this entry in pdf file format.

Note: 
* All communication must be done in EN578 language (English and/or French, if necessary).
* The bidder is required to ensure that the tender documents provided here are correct and complete, but Canadians can verify this information in the original document.

Post Your Tender Proposal At This Link: 
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tenders&+contracts/category?&id=f&=f&n=&n=&r=&e=&r- &p=n- &r=&=&p-


 Feel free to add any header or footers you think useful. It should be in nice format as requested.
